bio: I am a CS graduate from Arizona State University.

I have 4+ years of industry experience in Software Engineering working with companies like Amazon and Gen. During this time, I have had the opportunity to work on multiple projects spanning a wide range of domains like UX Automation library development, Windows and Linux client-side application development and mobile application development.
My key skills include C++, React, React-Native, Node.js and Python.

undergradProjects.name: Musician event booking platform
undergradProjects.description: A website for county musicians to register and be requested to perform for events by organizers.
undergradProjects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, Redux, Styled-Components, react-router-dom

undergradProjects.name: Rubik's Cube solver
undergradProjects.description: An interactive website where users can play with the rubik's cube and learn to solve it.
undergradProjects.stacks: Tech Stack : Chrome cube labs, Javascript, jQuery

undergradProjects.name: Website for test-taking
undergradProjects.description: A Full-Stack website where teachers can upload questions, create and schedule online tests for students.
undergradProjects.stacks: Tech Stack : Javascript, jQuery, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB

undergradProjects.name: Memory game
undergradProjects.description: A Game that i developed in the given time of 24hrs, as part of Daksh Web-Design contest by SASTRA University on Feb 2017 (Won 3rd place overall across all colleges in Tamil Nadu state).

projects.name: OpenRabbit
projects.description: An AI-powered conversational assistant that enables residents and visitors to access information about San Francisco's city services and resources efficiently and quickly.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, Next.js, GPT 4o, Silero VAD, Whisper-Base, Deepgram Aura, Mailgun, Spotify API, Suno.ai, Clerk.dev

projects.name: CityHub
projects.description: An AI-powered conversational assistant that enables residents and visitors to access information about San Francisco's city services and resources efficiently and quickly.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React.js, FastAPI, Brave Search API, Ollama, LLAMA3, Groq

projects.name: Covid-19 Symptoms Logger
projects.description: Mobile app for measuring Heart Rate and Respiratory Rate and Logging symptoms data.
projects.stacks: Tech Stack : React Native, Redux, expo-camera, React Navigation, React Native Sensors
